userrolescope.name: User Role Scope

list.title: User Role Scopes
list.description:
User roles assigned to users in stock management are required to have been scoped by location and stock operation type.
Users will not be able to access stock management functionality unless their scopes are defined.

delete.confirmText: Are you sure you want to delete the selected scopes?
delete.failed: Failed to delete user role scopes.

load.failed: Failed to load user role scope

edit.title: Editing user role scope
edit.stockoperationsdescription: The role will be applicable to only selected stock operations.
edit.locationsdescendantsdescription: Use the toggle to apply this scope to the locations under the selected location.
